operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on any Cluster.
Get the list of events generated on any Cluster.

operations.notes: Get a Cluster with the specified id.

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on a specified Cluster.
Get the list of events generated on a specified Cluster.
Get the stats for a specified Cluster.
operations.notes: If start time and end time are included in the query string, then historical stats are retrieved. Otherwise, the latest stats are retrieved.

actions.description: Possible actions to resolve this alert

chart_queries.description: Charts that are relevant to this cause

has_global_details.description: Whether the alert has global details or not

num_resolved_count.description: Number of times this cause has resolved the alert

parent_cause_id.description: Id of the alert/cause this is a possible cause for

troubleshooting_steps.description: Steps to determine whether this is the cause.

severity.description: This field describes the severity of the alert.

metric_details.description: List of metric details associated with the alert
metric_details.notes: List of metric details associated with the alert

severity_trails.description: List that contains severity level change details
severity_trails.notes: List that contains severity level change details

comparison_operator.description: Comparison Operator to be applied for teh values.

condition_type.description: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.
condition_type.notes: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.

metric_value_details.description: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle
metric_value_details.notes: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle

metric_threshold_value.description: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.
metric_threshold_value.notes: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.

metric_value.description: Actual value of the metric at that given time.
metric_value.notes: Actual value of the metric at that given time.

state_change_time_stamp_in_usecs.description: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.
state_change_time_stamp_in_usecs.notes: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.

severity.description: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL
severity.notes: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL

severity_change_timestamp_in_usecs.description: Time at which the severity level change occurred
severity_change_timestamp_in_usecs.notes: Time at which the severity level change occurred

all_hyperv_nodes_in_failover_cluster.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates whether all the Hyper-V nodes in the NOS cluster (that are not marked for removal)are a part of a Hyper-V failover cluster

cluster_functions.description: This field describes the type of cluster

cluster_uuid.description: Uuid of the cluster this entity belongs to

credential.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this propertyindicates the credential for the account that has permissions to modify the domain account representing the NOS cluster

domain.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates the AD domain name that this cluster is a part of

enable_efficient_metric_sync.description: Indicates if the metric syncing from PE to PC should be downsampled

enforce_rackable_unit_aware_placement.description: Indicates whether RackableUnit (RU) aware placement has been enforced.

gpu_driver_version.description: Host driver version of the GPU

nos_cluster_and_hosts_domain_joined.description: If the cluster includes Hyper-V nodes, then this property indicates whether the NOS cluster and the constituent hosts are all joined to the same domain

ssd_pinning_percentage_limit.description: This field describes the allowable percentage pinning on the ssd

storage_type.description: This field describes the storage type of cluster

external_client_enabled.description: Indicates whether external iscsi initiators are enabled or not

enabled.description: Whether data in transit encryption is enabled.
enabled.notes: Set to true/false to enable/disable data in transit encryption.

last_disabled_timestamp_secs.description: Unix epoch timestamp when data in transit encryption was last disabled.
last_disabled_timestamp_secs.notes: Timestamp when data in transit encryption was last disabled.

last_enabled_timestamp_secs.description: Unix epoch timestamp when data in transit encryption was last enabled.
last_enabled_timestamp_secs.notes: Timestamp when data in transit encryption was enabled.

address_value.description: Address of the proxy either IPv4 or IPv6

port.description: Port on which proxy is binding
port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

proxy_types.description: Proxy types to send applicable traffic
proxy_types.notes: Proxy types to send applicable traffic. Supports 'http' 'https', and 'socks' proxy configuration.

delete_intent_set.description: Setting this to True will start a background process to delete all files from recycle bin. Deletion is still in progress if this is set to True in a GET call.
delete_intent_set.notes: Indicates an intent to delete all files from recycle bin

recycle_bin_disabled_reason.description: If present, this indicates the reason why recycle bin is disabled temporarily by the system.
recycle_bin_disabled_reason.notes: Reason why recycle bin is disabled by the system

recycle_bin_disabled_timestamp_secs.description: Epoch timestamp in seconds when recycle bin was disabled by the system.
recycle_bin_disabled_timestamp_secs.notes: Timestamp when recycle bin was disabled

recycle_bin_ttlsecs.description: Time to live in seconds of a file in recycle bin. Setting this to 0 will disable recycle bin.
recycle_bin_ttlsecs.notes: Time to live in seconds of a file in recycle bin

port.notes: Any port number which is in the range 0 - 65536

server_address.description: Address of SMTP server, either IPv4 or IPv6

drs_enabled.description: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not. Applicable only for vCenter.
drs_enabled.notes: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not.

drs_vm_behaviour.description: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not. Applicable only for vCenter.
drs_vm_behaviour.notes: Denotes if DRS is enabled or not.

ha_enabled.description: Denotes if HA is enabled or not.
ha_enabled.notes: Denotes if HA is enabled or not.

in_use.description: Indicates whether any host is managed by this server or not.
in_use.notes: Indicates whether any host is managed by this server or not.

registered.description: Denotes whether the server is registered with Nutanix or not
registered.notes: Denotes whether the server is registered with Nutanix or not
